snippet: MEYERSON--Philip. The congregation of Westchester Reform Temple mourns the death of a devoted member from its founding generation and extends sympathy to his bereaved family. Helene K. Gray, President Jonathan E. Blake, Rabbi Jill Abramson, Cantor 1/3
lead_paragraph: MEYERSON--Philip. The congregation of Westchester Reform Temple mourns the death of a devoted member from its founding generation and extends sympathy to his bereaved family. Helene K. Gray, President Jonathan E. Blake, Rabbi Jill Abramson, Cantor 1/3
